enhanced_description: Neurowyzr is a clinical neuroscience partner offering services and products focused on brain health and performance. It aims to protect quality of life and optimize personal potential by enabling early detection, diagnosis, therapy, monitoring, and prevention of brain decline. The solutions are built on clinical evidence and powered by advanced analytics and AI, providing a complete suite of gamified digital assessments and omni-platform care. Key offerings include the Digital Brain Function Screen for early detection of brain decline using medical-grade brain games, Nhyre for identifying and placing the right candidates into roles using neuroscience-based tools, and Attycus for maximizing staff productivity and employee well-being in attention-critical industries through gamified brain tests.
key_use_cases: Placing candidates into the right roles
competitive_advantages: Powered by advanced analytics and AI
roi_benefits: Early detection and prevention of brain decline
Better candidate identification and placement leading to right-fit roles
